featured_college.name: Department of Architecture and Planning, IIT Roorkee
featured_college.description: Still the Master Builders - With its smart studios/labs focusing on new technologies and climate-responsive building, the Department of Architecture and Planning at IIT Roorkee equips students for a changing world
reasons_for_being_best: State-of-the-art infrastructure with advanced design studios, computing labs, well-equipped digital library fostering high-quality learning environment
Research in sustainability, urban resilience and building technologies with cutting-edge research findings
Well-rounded curriculum blending theoretical grounding with hands-on practice, aligning with India's National Education Policy
Incorporated trends like Machine Learning, smart environments, computational design, resilient and climate-responsive architecture
Cultural and technical festivals like Thomso and Cognizance, F-Summit, Startup Expo, active student societies
